column4: Hi, I'm trying to install F.E.A.R. and Need for speed - Pro Street, when trying to open setup.exe with wine I get this error message : "access denied", how do I fix this?
does that game even work well in Wine? have you checked the appdb?
also #winehq is a good channel for help with stuff like that
I have looked winehq, it got platinum, there was no answer in the winehq channel at first
